27 // data source max length
28 #define BGPSTREAM_DS_MAX_LEN 512
29 
30 // dump name max length
31 #define BGPSTREAM_DUMP_MAX_LEN 1024
32 
33 // parameters/attribute/filters max length
34 #define BGPSTREAM_PAR_MAX_LEN 512
